plugin-data.name: Logo and Footer XXL V1.0 02/18
plugin-data.description: Insert a logo. Insert a Footer on Top with many setups e.g. 'scroll on top'

bezeichnung_beschreibung: Text for visiters e.g. -scroll on top; HTML e.g. HTML img is ok!
bezeichnung_logo_beschreibung: Upload Logo Image in Upload Directory and write the filename:
bezeichnung_hochscrollen_farbe_beschreib: Color e.g. yellow, green,... or html colors
